author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

This PR updates tests (relvals and unittest) running reconstruction for PPS detectors. Main reason for update is to have the tests running on current 2024 data. See also relevant issue: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44095

#### PR validation:

`scram b runtests` for `RecoPPS\Local` and standard `runTheMatrix` with newly introduced relvals 1046, 1047, 1048 and 1049.
title: PPS tests updated with 2024 data
